review_title: Phenomenally supportive, though a touch light on adequate compensation.
years_at_company: Phenomenally supportive, though a touch light on adequate compensation.
pros:
You couldn't ask for a better team
Great space to try ideas out
So much support from the team
Brilliant colleagues
cons: Honestly? Traffic and compensation for equal value skills -- this specific team is bleeding talent because their corporate leaders continue to bind their hands, in terms of offering pay competitive to other opportunities in the market.
advice_to_mgmt:
To the Corp team, unleash and empower your leaders in MRSS, MSS, and HDSS to compete with offers given to your employees.
You're losing out on fantastic talent by telling them they can't change pay.
